Class AttackingPlant

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.gridworld.actor.Actor
      • info.gridworld.actor.Bug
        • Pvz.Unit
          • Pvz.Plant
            • Pvz.AttackingPlant
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Cactus, CatPlant, DoubleFirePeaShooter, DoublePeaShooter, FirePeaShooter, FrankenShooter, MultiPeaShooter, Peashooter

    public class AttackingPlant
extends Plant
    An AttackingPlant is a plant which can shoot projectiles at zombies

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AttackingPlant()
      Constructs a plant which can attack zombies
